chapters.title: Epilogue: An AnswerGlossary
chapters.info: Osan'gar, p. 690 (834)—Name given to the reincarnation of one of the Forsaken. It was the left-hand dagger in a form of dueling popular right after the creation of the Bore. The sport fell from common practice, since almost invariably both duelists died from the slow poison on the daggers. Osan'gar states that he helped make the Trollocs, indicating that in his past life he was Aginor. He spent months masquerading as Corlan Dashiva, one of the Asha'man. Dashiva and Osan'gar were killed at Shadar Logoth during the cleansing of saidin. See also Aran'gar.
